trans-unit.source: NOTE: The only supported usage path for vApp properties is for existing user-configurable keys. These generally come from an existing template that was created from an imported OVF or OVA file. You cannot set values for vApp properties on virtual machines created from scratch, virtual machines lacking a vApp configuration, or on property keys that do not exist.
trans-unit.target: 注意： vApp属性唯一受支持的使用路径是现有的用户可配置密钥。这些通常来自从导入的OVF或OVA文件创建的现有模板。您不能在从头创建的虚拟机，缺少vApp配置的虚拟机上或在不存在的属性键上为vApp属性设置值。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The resource only support to create PayByTraffic elastic IP for international account. Otherwise, you will happened error COMMODITY.INVALID_COMPONENT. Your account is international if you can use it to login in International Web Console.
trans-unit.target: 注意：资源仅支持为国际帐户创建 PayByTraffic 弹性IP。否则，您将发生错误 COMMODITY.INVALID_COMPONENT 。如果您可以使用该帐户登录国际Web控制台，则该帐户是国际帐户。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: There are restrictions on the configuration of query logging. Notably, the CloudWatch log group must be in the us-east-1 region, a permissive CloudWatch log resource policy must be in place, and the Route53 hosted zone must be public. See Configuring Logging for DNS Queries for additional details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：查询日志记录的配置受到限制。值得注意的是，CloudWatch日志组必须位于 us-east-1 区域，必须制定许可的CloudWatch日志资源策略，并且Route53托管区域必须是公共的。有关其他详细信息，请参见为DNS查询配置日志。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: There are some situations where datastore creation will not work when working through vCenter (usually when trying to create a datastore on a single host with local disks). trans-unit.source: NOTE: This provider requires API write access and hence is not supported on a free ESXi license.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此提供程序需要API写访问权限，因此免费的ESXi许可证不支持此提供程序。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: To change a "Shared-Performance" instance to a "Performance-guaranteed" instance, the SLB will have a short probability of business interruption (10 seconds-30 seconds). Advise to change it during the business downturn, or migrate business to other SLB Instances by using GSLB before changing.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要将“共享性能”实例更改为“性能保证”实例，SLB的业务中断概率很短（10秒至30秒）。建议在业务下滑期间进行更改，或在更改之前使用GSLB将业务迁移到其他SLB实例。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: To help facilitate the authoring of modules that support target groups of any protocol, you can define stickiness regardless of the protocol chosen. However, for TCP target groups, enabled must be false.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了帮助编写支持任何协议目标组的模块，可以定义 stickiness 而不管选择的协议如何。但是，对于 TCP 目标组， enabled 必须为 false 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Triton Service Groups are in Preview and only supported in specific regions at this time. They will become Generally Available in the near future.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Triton服务组处于“预览”状态，目前仅在特定区域中受支持。它们将在不久的将来变得普遍可用。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Unlike vsphere_vmfs_datastore, a NAS datastore is only mounted on the hosts you choose to mount it on. To mount on multiple hosts, you must specify each host that you want to add in the host_system_ids argument.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与 vsphere_vmfs_datastore 不同，NAS数据存储区仅安装在您选择安装它的主机上。要安装在多个主机上，必须在 host_system_ids 参数中指定要添加的每个主机。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Use of datastore_cluster_id requires Storage DRS to be enabled on that cluster.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 datastore_cluster_id 要求在该群集上启用Storage DRS。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Using auto_expand with a statically defined number_of_ports may lead to errors when the port count grows past the amount specified. If you specify number_of_ports, you may wish to set auto_expand to false.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当端口计数超过指定的数量时，将 auto_expand 与静态定义的 number_of_ports 一起使用可能会导致错误。如果指定 number_of_ports ，则可能希望将 auto_expand 设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Using a filter is recommended if there is any chance the host will have any specific storage devices added to it that may affect the order of the output disks attribute below, which is lexicographically sorted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果主机可能会添加任何特定的存储设备，这可能会影响下面的输出 disks 属性的顺序（按字典顺序排序），则建议使用 filter 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Using this resource always implies an override, even if one of dpm_enabled or dpm_automation_level is omitted. Take note of the defaults for both options.
trans-unit.target: 注意：即使忽略了 dpm_enabled 或 dpm_automation_level 之一，使用此资源也总是意味着覆盖。注意这两个选项的默认值。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Using this resource always implies an override, even if one of drs_enabled or drs_automation_level is omitted. Take note of the defaults for both options.
trans-unit.target: 注意：即使忽略了 drs_enabled 或 drs_automation_level 之一，使用此资源也总是意味着覆盖。注意这两个选项的默认值。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: VMware recommends using a minimum of 3 NICs when using beacon probing (configured with check_beacon).
trans-unit.target: 注意： VMware建议在使用信标探测（通过 check_beacon 配置）时至少使用3个NIC 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: VMware recommends using a minimum of 3 NICs when using beacon probing.
trans-unit.target: 注意： VMware建议在使用信标探测时至少使用3个NIC。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: We recommend using this guide to build a separate Terraform configuration (for easy tear down) and more importantly running it in a separate AWS account as your production infrastructure. While it is self-contained and should not affect existing infrastructure, its always best to be cautious!
trans-unit.target: 注意：我们建议您使用本指南构建单独的Terraform配置（以方便拆卸），更重要的是，在作为生产基础架构的单独AWS账户中运行它。尽管它是独立的，不应影响现有的基础结构，但始终要谨慎！

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When start_time and end_time are specified with recurrence , they form the boundaries of when the recurring action will start and stop.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当使用 recurrence 指定 start_time 和 end_time 时，它们构成了重复动作将开始和停止的时间的边界。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When Athena queries are executed, result files may be created in the specified bucket. Consider using force_destroy on the bucket too in order to avoid any problems when destroying the bucket.
trans-unit.target: 注意：执行Athena查询时，可能会在指定的存储段中创建结果文件。也可以考虑在存储桶上使用 force_destroy ，以避免在销毁存储桶时出现任何问题。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When creating a Linux App Service Plan, the reserved field must be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 注意：创建 Linux 应用程序服务计划时，必须将 reserved 字段设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When creating a subscription rule of type CorrelationFilter at least one property must be set in the correlation_filter block.
trans-unit.target: 注意：创建类型为 CorrelationFilter 的订阅规则时，必须在 correlation_filter 块中至少设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When managing datastore clusters, member datastores, and virtual machines within the same Terraform configuration, race conditions can apply. This is because datastore clusters must be created before datastores can be assigned to them, and the respective vsphere_virtual_machine resources will no longer have an implicit dependency on the specific datastore resources. Use depends_on to create an explicit dependency on the datastores in the cluster, or manage datastore clusters and datastores in a separate configuration.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在同一Terraform配置中管理数据存储群集，成员数据存储和虚拟机时，竞争条件可能适用。这是因为必须先创建数据存储群集，然后才能将数据存储分配给它们，并且各个 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源将不再对特定的数据存储资源具有隐式依赖性。使用 depends_on 在群集中的数据存储上创建显式依赖关系，或在单独的配置中管理数据存储群集和数据存储。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When removing a Glacier Vault, the Vault must be empty.
trans-unit.target: 注意：卸下Glacier Vault时，Vault必须为空。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When the pre-deletion days elapses, the key is permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 注意：删除前的日子过后，密钥将被永久删除，无法恢复。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When used against ESXi, this data source always fetches the server's "default" datacenter, which is a special datacenter unrelated to the datacenters that exist in any vCenter server that might be managing this host. Hence, the name attribute is completely ignored.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在ESXi上使用时，此数据源始终获取服务器的“默认”数据中心，这是一个特殊的数据中心，与可能正在管理该主机的任何vCenter Server中存在的数据中心无关。因此， name 属性被完全忽略。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When used against an ESXi host directly, this data source always fetches the server's host object ID, regardless of what is entered into name.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当直接用于ESXi主机时，无论输入 name 是什么，此数据源始终会获取服务器的主机对象ID 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When using ELB as the health_check_type, health_check_grace_period is required.
trans-unit.target: 注意：将 ELB 用作 health_check_type 时，需要 health_check_grace_period 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When using the Triton Public Cloud, the endpoint attribute might include an old, but still fully supported, domain name "joyentcloud.com" (e.g. https://us-east-1.api.joyentcloud.com), even when the new domain name "joyent.com" has been used to configure the cloud endpoint URL in the Trition provider.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用Triton Public Cloud时， endpoint 属性可能包括旧的但仍受完全支持的域名“ joyentcloud.com”（例如https://us-east-1.api.joyentcloud.com），即使新域名“ joyent.com”已用于在Trition提供程序中配置云端点URL 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When using this resource, the LoadBalancer needs to have a FrontEnd IP Configuration Attached
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用此资源时，LoadBalancer需要附加一个前端IP配置。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When you want to destroy this resource forcefully(means release all the relationships associated with it automatically and then destroy it) without set force with true at beginning, you need add force = true to configuration file and run terraform plan, then you can delete resource forcefully.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当你想强行摧毁这个资源（指释放所有与之自动关联关系，然后摧毁它），而集 force 与 true 的开始，你需要添加 force = true 到配置文件并运行 terraform plan ，那么你就可以强制删除资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: When you want to destroy this resource forcefully(means remove all the relationships associated with it automatically and then destroy it) without set force with true at beginning, you need add force = true to configuration file and run terraform plan, then you can delete resource forcefully.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当你想强行摧毁这个资源（指删除所有与它自动关联关系，然后摧毁它），而集 force 与 true 的开始，你需要添加 force = true 到配置文件并运行 terraform plan ，那么你就可以强制删除资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: While id and key may look the same in state, they are documented differently in the vSphere API and come from different fields in the port group object. If you are asked to supply an managed object reference ID to another resource, be sure to use the id field.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管 id 和 key 的状态可能看起来相同，但是它们在vSphere API中的记录方式有所不同，并且分别来自端口组对象的不同字段。如果要求您将托管对象引用ID提供给另一个资源，请确保使用 id 字段。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can add associable types to a category, but you cannot remove them. Attempting to do so will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以将关联类型添加到类别，但是不能将其删除。尝试这样做将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can launch an ECS instance for a VPC network via specifying parameter vswitch_id. One instance can only belong to one VSwitch.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以通过指定参数 vswitch_id 为VPC网络启动ECS实例。一个实例只能属于一个VSwitch。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can launch an ESS scaling group for a VPC network via specifying parameter vswitch_ids.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以通过指定参数 vswitch_ids 为VPC网络启动ESS伸缩组。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can migrate from MeteredData to UnlimitedData, but not the other way around.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以从 MeteredData 迁移到 UnlimitedData ，但不能相反。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can specify "cloudwatch_destination" or "kinesis_destination" but not both
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以指定 "cloudwatch_destination" 或 "kinesis_destination" 但不能同时指定

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can specify either the instance ID or the network_interface ID, but not both. Including both will not return an error from the AWS API, but will have undefined behavior. See the relevant AssociateAddress API Call for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以指定 instance ID或 network_interface ID，但不能同时指定两者。包括两者都不会从AWS API返回错误，但是具有未定义的行为。有关更多信息，请参见相关的AssociateAddress API调用。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You can use the triton_fabric_vlan data source to retrieve details about a Fabric VLAN for reference.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以使用triton_fabric_vlan数据源检索有关Fabric VLAN的详细信息以供参考。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You cannot create a metric alarm consisting of both statistic and extended_statistic parameters. You must choose one or the other
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不能创建同时由 statistic 和 extended_statistic 参数组成的度量标准警报。您必须选择其中一个

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You cannot decrease the size of a datastore. If the resource detects disks removed from the configuration, Terraform will give an error. To reduce the size of the datastore, the resource needs to be re-created - run terraform taint to taint the resource so it can be re-created.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不能减小数据存储区的大小。如果资源检测到从配置中删除的磁盘，Terraform将给出错误。为了减少数据存储的大小，需要重新创建资源-运行 terraform taint 来污染资源，以便可以重新创建它。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You cannot use acceleration_status in cn-north-1 or us-gov-west-1
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不能使用 acceleration_status 在 cn-north-1 或 us-gov-west-1

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You may want to omit desired_capacity attribute from attached aws_autoscaling_group when using autoscaling policies. It's good practice to pick either manual or dynamic (policy-based) scaling.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用自动缩放策略时，您可能想从附加的 aws_autoscaling_group 中省略 desired_capacity 属性。最好选择手动或动态（基于策略）扩展。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: You should set the secret_file if you want to get the access key.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果要获取访问密钥，则应设置 secret_file 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: a PGP key is not required, however it is strongly encouraged. Without a PGP key, the private key material will be stored in state unencrypted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不需要PGP密钥，但是强烈建议使用。没有PGP密钥，私钥材料将以未加密状态存储。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: a PGP key is not required, however it is strongly encouraged. Without a PGP key, the private key material will be stored in state unencrypted. pgp_key is ignored if public_key is supplied.

trans-unit.source: NOTE: vSphere DRS requires a vSphere Enterprise Plus license.

trans-unit.source: NOTE:adapter_type is deprecated: it does not dictate the type of controller that the virtual disk will be attached to on the virtual machine. Please see the scsi_type parameter in the vsphere_virtual_machine resource for information on how to control disk controller types. This parameter will be removed in future versions of the vSphere provider.
trans-unit.target: 注： adapter_type 被弃用：它不规定该虚拟磁盘将被附加到虚拟机上的控制器类型。请参阅 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源中的 scsi_type 参数，以获取有关如何控制磁盘控制器类型的信息。在以后的vSphere提供程序版本中将删除此参数。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:admin_password is a sensitive field in Terraform and will not be output on-screen, but is stored in state and sent to the VM in plain text - keep this in mind when provisioning your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 注意： admin_password 是Terraform中的一个敏感字段，不会在屏幕上输出，而是以状态存储并以纯文本格式发送到VM-在配置基础结构时请记住这一点。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:admin_password must be between 6-72 characters long and must satisfy at least 3 of password complexity requirements from the following: 1. Contains an uppercase character 2. Contains a lowercase character 3. Contains a numeric digit 4. Contains a special character
trans-unit.target: 注意： admin_password 的长度必须在6-72个字符之间，并且必须满足以下至少3个密码复杂性要求：1.包含大写字符2.包含小写字符3.包含数字4.包含特殊字符

trans-unit.source: NOTE:alicloud_eip_association is useful in scenarios where EIPs are either pre-existing or distributed to customers or users and therefore cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 注意： alicloud_eip_association 在预先存在EIP或将其分发给客户或用户因而无法更改的方案中很有用。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:alicloud_security_group is used to build and manage a security group, and alicloud_security_group_rule can define ingress or egress rules for it.
trans-unit.target: 注意： alicloud_security_group 用于构建和管理安全组， alicloud_security_group_rule 可以为其定义入口或出口规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:aws_eip_association is useful in scenarios where EIPs are either pre-existing or distributed to customers or users and therefore cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 注意： aws_eip_association 在预先存在EIP或将其分发给客户或用户且因此无法更改的方案中很有用。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:domain_admin_password is a sensitive field in Terraform and will not be output on-screen, but is stored in state and sent to the VM in plain text - keep this in mind when provisioning your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 注意： domain_admin_password 是Terraform中的一个敏感字段，不会在屏幕上输出，但会以状态存储并以纯文本格式发送到VM-在配置基础结构时请记住这一点。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:name must be between 1-128 characters long and must satisfy all of the requirements below: 1. Contains only alphanumeric and hyphen characters 2. Cannot start with a number or hyphen 3. Cannot end with a hyphen
trans-unit.target: 注意： name 必须在1-128个字符之间，并且必须满足以下所有要求：1.仅包含字母数字和连字符。2.不能以数字或连字符开头。3.不能以连字符结尾。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:nic_type should set to intranet when security group type is vpc or specifying the source_security_group_id. In this situation it does not distinguish between intranet and internet, the rule is effective on them both.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当安全组类型为 vpc 或指定 source_security_group_id 时， nic_type 应该设置为 intranet 。在这种情况下，它无法区分Intranet和Internet，该规则对两者均有效。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:path can be modified - the resulting behavior is dependent on what section of path you are modifying. If you are modifying the parent (so any part before the last /), your folder will be moved to that new parent. If modifying the name (the part after the last /), your folder will be renamed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以修改 path -产生的行为取决于您要修改的 path 哪一部分。如果您要修改父级（因此最后一个 / 之前的任何部分），您的文件夹将被移至该新父级。如果修改名称（最后一个 / 后面的部分），则文件夹将被重命名。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:scsi_controller_count should only be modified when you will need more than 15 disks on a single virtual machine, or in rare cases that require a dedicated controller for certain disks. HashiCorp does not support exploiting this value to add out-of-band devices.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当在单个虚拟机上需要超过15个磁盘时，或者在极少数情况下某些磁盘需要专用控制器的情况下，才应修改 scsi_controller_count 。HashiCorp不支持利用此值来添加带外设备。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:sse_s3 is currently unsupported.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当前不支持 sse_s3 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:use_remote_gateways must be set to false if using Global Virtual Network Peerings.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果使用全局虚拟网络对等，必须将 use_remote_gateways 设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE At least one of the 3 permissions below needs to be set.
trans-unit.target: 注意至少需要设置以下3种权限之一。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Proper escaping is required for JSON field values containing quotes (") such as environment values. If directly setting the JSON, they should be escaped as \" in the JSON, e.g. "value": "I \"love\" escaped quotes". If using a Terraform variable value, they should be escaped as \\\" in the variable, e.g. value = "I \\\"love\\\" escaped quotes" in the variable and "value": "${var.myvariable}" in the JSON.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于包含引号（ " ）的JSON字段值（例如 environment 值），必须进行正确的转义。如果直接设置JSON，则应在JSON中将其转义为 \" ，例如， "value": "I \"love\" escaped quotes" 。如果使用Terraform变量值，则应在变量中将其转义为 \\\" ，例如，变量中的 value = "I \\\"love\\\" escaped quotes" 和 "value": "${var.myvariable}" 。

trans-unit.source: Name - this is a friendly identifier and can be anything (e.g. "Terraform")
trans-unit.target: 名称 -这是一个友好的标识符，可以是任何名称（例如“ Terraform”）

trans-unit.source: Named terraform-<PROVIDER>-<NAME>. Module repositories must use this three-part name format, where <NAME> reflects the type of infrastructure the module manages and <PROVIDER> is the main provider where it creates that infrastructure. The <NAME> segment can contain additional hyphens. Examples: terraform-google-vault or terraform-aws-ec2-instance.
trans-unit.target: 名为 terraform-<PROVIDER>-<NAME> 。模块存储库必须使用这种由三部分组成的名称格式，其中 <NAME> 反映模块管理的基础结构的类型，而 <PROVIDER> 是创建该基础结构的主要提供者。所述 <NAME> 段可含有另外的连字符。例如： terraform-google-vault 或 terraform-aws-ec2-instance 。

trans-unit.source: Nested modules. Nested modules should exist under the modules/ subdirectory. Any nested module with a README.md is considered usable by an external user. If a README doesn't exist, it is considered for internal use only. These are purely advisory; Terraform will not actively deny usage of internal modules. Nested modules should be used to split complex behavior into multiple small modules that advanced users can carefully pick and choose. For example, the Consul module has a nested module for creating the Cluster that is separate from the module to setup necessary IAM policies. This allows a user to bring in their own IAM policy choices.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套模块。嵌套模块应存在于 modules/ 子目录下。任何带有 README.md 的嵌套模块都可以被外部用户使用。如果不存在自述文件，则仅将其作为内部使用。这些纯粹是建议性的； Terraform不会主动拒绝使用内部模块。嵌套模块应用于将复杂的行为分解为高级用户可以仔细选择的多个小模块。例如，Consul模块具有一个用于创建群集的嵌套模块，该模块与该模块分开以设置必要的IAM策略。这允许用户引入他们自己的IAM策略选择。

trans-unit.source: No value within the terraform block can use interpolations. The terraform block is loaded very early in the execution of Terraform and interpolations are not yet available.
trans-unit.target: terraform 块内的任何值均不能使用插值。该 terraform 块在Terraform的执行很早就装和插补尚未公布。

trans-unit.source: Note on ARM Template Deployments: Due to the way the underlying Azure API is designed, Terraform can only manage the deployment of the ARM Template - and not any resources which are created by it. This means that when deleting the azurerm_template_deployment resource, Terraform will only remove the reference to the deployment, whilst leaving any resources created by that ARM Template Deployment. One workaround for this is to use a unique Resource Group for each ARM Template Deployment, which means deleting the Resource Group would contain any resources created within it - however this isn't ideal. More information.
trans-unit.target: 关于ARM模板部署的注意事项：由于底层Azure API的设计方式，Terraform只能管理ARM模板的部署-不能管理由它创建的任何资源。这意味着，删除 azurerm_template_deployment 资源时，Terraform将仅删除对该部署的引用，同时保留该ARM模板部署创建的任何资源。一种解决方法是为每个ARM模板部署使用唯一的资源组，这意味着删除资源组将包含其中创建的所有资源-但这并不理想。更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Note on terminology: In VMCP, Permanent Device Loss (PDL), or a failure where access to a specific disk device is not recoverable, is differentiated from an All Paths Down (APD) failure, which is used to denote a transient failure where disk device access may eventually return. Take note of this when tuning these options.
trans-unit.target: 术语说明：在VMCP中，永久设备丢失（PDL）或无法恢复对特定磁盘设备的访问的故障与“所有路径中断（APD）”故障不同，后者用于表示磁盘发生瞬时故障。设备访问可能最终会返回。调整这些选项时，请注意这一点。

trans-unit.source: Note when using with standalone ESXi: When using ESXi without vCenter, you don't have to specify either attribute to use this data source. An empty declaration will load the host's root resource pool.
trans-unit.target: 在独立ESXi上使用时请注意：在不使用vCenter的ESXi上使用时，无需指定任何属性即可使用此数据源。一个空的声明将加载主机的根资源池。

trans-unit.source: Note: Automatic Failover is unavailable for Redis versions earlier than 2.8.6, and unavailable on T1 and T2 node types. See the Amazon Replication with Redis guide for full details on using Replication Groups.

trans-unit.source: Note: Both network must create a peering with each other for the peering to be functional.
trans-unit.target: 注意：两个网络都必须彼此创建对等体，以使对等体起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note: Config Rule requires an existing Configuration Recorder to be present. Use of depends_on is recommended (as shown below) to avoid race conditions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：“配置规则”要求存在现有的“ 配置记录器”。建议使用 depends_on （如下所示）以避免出现竞争情况。

trans-unit.source: Note: Currently in GuardDuty, users from member accounts cannot upload and further manage IPSets. IPSets that are uploaded by the master account are imposed on GuardDuty functionality in its member accounts. See the GuardDuty API Documentation
trans-unit.target: 注意：当前在GuardDuty中，来自成员帐户的用户无法上载和进一步管理IPSet。由主帐户上载的IPSet被强加在其成员帐户中的GuardDuty功能上。请参阅GuardDuty API文档

trans-unit.source: Note: Currently in GuardDuty, users from member accounts cannot upload and further manage ThreatIntelSets. ThreatIntelSets that are uploaded by the master account are imposed on GuardDuty functionality in its member accounts. See the GuardDuty API Documentation
trans-unit.target: 注意：当前在GuardDuty中，来自成员帐户的用户无法上载和进一步管理ThreatIntelSet。主帐户上载的ThreatIntelSet被强加给其成员帐户中的GuardDuty功能。请参阅GuardDuty API文档

trans-unit.source: Note: Delivery Channel requires a Configuration Recorder to be present. Use of depends_on (as shown below) is recommended to avoid race conditions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：传递通道要求配置记录器存在。建议使用 depends_on （如下所示）以避免出现竞争情况。

trans-unit.source: Note: Depends on having aws_api_gateway_integration inside your rest api (which in turn depends on aws_api_gateway_method). To avoid race conditions you might need to add an explicit depends_on = ["aws_api_gateway_integration.name"].
trans-unit.target: 注意：取决于在您的rest api 中 aws_api_gateway_integration （这又取决于 aws_api_gateway_method ）。为了避免竞争情况，您可能需要添加一个显式的 depends_on = ["aws_api_gateway_integration.name"] 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Depends on having aws_api_gateway_integration inside your rest api. To ensure this you might need to add an explicit depends_on for clean runs.
trans-unit.target: 注意：取决于您的rest api 中是否 aws_api_gateway_integration 。为了确保这一点，您可能需要为显式运行添加一个显式的 depends_on 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Deployment Slots are not supported in the Free, Shared, or Basic App Service Plans.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Free ， Shared 或 Basic App Service计划不支持部署插槽。

trans-unit.source: Note: Do not use network_interface to associate the EIP to aws_lb or aws_nat_gateway resources. Instead use the allocation_id available in those resources to allow AWS to manage the association, otherwise you will see AuthFailure errors.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请勿使用 network_interface 将EIP关联到 aws_lb 或 aws_nat_gateway 资源。而是使用这些资源中可用的 allocation_id 来允许AWS管理关联，否则您将看到 AuthFailure 错误。

trans-unit.source: Note: EIP may require IGW to exist prior to association. Use depends_on to set an explicit dependency on the IGW.
trans-unit.target: 注意： EIP可能要求关联之前存在IGW。使用 depends_on 设置对IGW的显式依赖。

trans-unit.source: Note: For GitHub source projects, the AWS account that Terraform uses to create this resource must have authorized CodeBuild to access GitHub's OAuth API in each applicable region. This is a manual step that must be done before creating webhooks with this resource. If OAuth is not configured, AWS will return an error similar to ResourceNotFoundException: Could not find access token for server type github. More information can be found in the CodeBuild User Guide.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于GitHub源项目，Terraform用于创建此资源的AWS账户必须具有授权的CodeBuild才能在每个适用区域中访问GitHub的OAuth API。这是一个手动步骤，在使用此资源创建Webhooks 之前必须完成。如果未配置OAuth，AWS将返回类似于 ResourceNotFoundException: Could not find access token for server type github 的错误：找不到服务器类型github的访问令牌。可以在CodeBuild用户指南中找到更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: For an AWS S3 Bucket, the Backend address is <domain>.s3-website-<region>.amazonaws.com. The default_host attribute should be set to <bucket_name>.s3-website-<region>.amazonaws.com. See the Fastly documentation on Amazon S3.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于AWS S3存储桶，后端地址为 <domain>.s3-website-<region>.amazonaws.com 。所述 default_host 的属性应该被设置为 <bucket_name>.s3-website-<region>.amazonaws.com 。请参阅Amazon S3上的Fastly文档。

trans-unit.source: Note: For cross-account (requester's AWS account differs from the accepter's AWS account) or inter-region VPC Peering Connections use the aws_vpc_peering_connection resource to manage the requester's side of the connection and use the aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter resource to manage the accepter's side of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于跨账户（请求者的AWS账户与接受者的AWS账户不同）或区域间VPC对等连接，请使用 aws_vpc_peering_connection 资源管理请求者的连接端，并使用 aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter 资源管理连接的接受者端。

trans-unit.source: Note: If networking_info is left unspecified, the instance will be booted in the shared_network.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果未指定 networking_info ，则实例将在 shared_network 中启动。

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果指定 content_encoding ，则负责对正文进行适当的编码（即， source 和 content 都期望已编码/压缩的字节）

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果只想管理项目元数据中的单个键/值对，而不要管理整个集合，请使用google_compute_project_metadata_item。

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果源类型是组织，则必须登录到主帐户，并且必须在组织中启用所有功能。AWS Config调用EnableAwsServiceAccess API以启用AWS Config和AWS Organizations之间的集成。

trans-unit.source: Note: Modifying the VPC Peering Connection options requires peering to be active. An automatic activation can be done using the auto_accept attribute. Alternatively, the VPC Peering Connection has to be made active manually using other means. See notes below for more information.

trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，配置虚拟网络网关会花费很长时间（30分钟到1个小时之间）

trans-unit.source: Note: Redis Firewall Rules can only be assigned to a Redis Cache with a Premium SKU.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Redis防火墙规则只能分配给具有 Premium SKU 的Redis缓存。

trans-unit.source: Note: Several restrictions apply when setting IAM policies through this API. See the setIamPolicy docs for a list of these restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：通过此API设置IAM策略时，存在一些限制。有关这些限制的列表，请参见setIamPolicy文档。

trans-unit.source: Note: Since Terraform allows hyphens in resource and variable names, it's best to use spaces between math operators to prevent confusion or unexpected behavior. For example, ${var.instance-count - 1} will subtract 1 from the instance-count variable value, while ${var.instance-count-1} will interpolate the instance-count-1 variable value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于Terraform允许在资源名称和变量名称中使用连字符，因此最好在数学运算符之间使用空格以防止混淆或意外行为。例如， ${var.instance-count - 1} 将减去1从 instance-count 变量值，而 ${var.instance-count-1} 将内插 instance-count-1 可变值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Starting Configuration Recorder requires a Delivery Channel to be present. Use of depends_on (as shown below) is recommended to avoid race conditions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：启动Configuration Recorder要求存在一个传递通道。建议使用 depends_on （如下所示）以避免出现竞争情况。

trans-unit.source: Note: Starting with Triton 0.2.0, Please note that when you want to specify the networks that you want the machine to be attached to, use the networks parameter and not the nic parameter.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Triton 0.2.0开始，请注意，当您要指定要连接机器的网络时，请使用 networks 参数而不是 nic 参数。

trans-unit.source: Note: Subnets IP ranges across peered VPC networks cannot overlap.
trans-unit.target: 注意：跨对等VPC网络的子网IP范围不能重叠。

trans-unit.source: Note: Terraform does not automatically rollback in the face of errors. Instead, your Terraform state file will be partially updated with any resources that successfully completed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：面对错误，Terraform不会自动回滚。相反，您的Terraform状态文件将使用成功完成的所有资源进行部分更新。

trans-unit.source: Note: The default security group for a VPC has the name default.
trans-unit.target: 注意：VPC的默认安全组的名称为 default 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The default security group for a VPC has the name default.
trans-unit.target: 注意：VPC的默认安全组的名称为 default 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The aws_vpn_gateway resource can also automatically attach the Virtual Private Gateway it creates to an existing VPC by setting the vpc_id attribute accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 aws_vpn_gateway 资源还可以自动通过设置附加虚拟专用网关它创建到现有VPC vpc_id 相应属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Publisher and Type of Virtual Machine Extensions can be found using the Azure CLI, via: shell $ az vm extension image list --location westus -o table
trans-unit.target: 注：该 Publisher 和 Type ：虚拟机的扩展可以使用Azure的CLI，通过发现 shell $ az vm extension image list --location westus -o table

trans-unit.source: Note: The Standard SKU is currently in Public Preview on an opt-in basis. More information, including how you can register for the Preview, and which regions Standard SKU's are available in are available here
trans-unit.target: 注：该 Standard SKU目前在公共预览上一个选择的依据。有关更多信息，包括如何注册预览版以及 Standard SKU可用的区域，请点击此处。

trans-unit.source: Note: The consul_agent_config resource differs from consul_agent_self, providing less information but utilizing stable APIs. consul_agent_self will be deprecated in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 consul_agent_config 从资源不同 consul_agent_self ，提供较少的信息，但利用稳定的API。 consul_agent_self 将在以后的版本中弃用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The dns_name attribute is only useful if the mount target is in a VPC that has support for DNS hostnames enabled. See Using DNS with Your VPC and VPC resource in Terraform for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 dns_name 如果安装目标是在一个对DNS主机名支持启用VPC的属性才有用。有关更多信息，请参见在Terraform中将DNS与VPC和VPC资源一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The dns_name attribute is only useful if the mount target is in a VPC that has support for DNS hostnames enabled. See Using DNS with Your VPC and VPC resource in Terraform for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 dns_name 如果安装目标是在一个对DNS主机名支持启用VPC的属性才有用。有关更多信息，请参见在Terraform中将DNS与VPC和VPC资源一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The secret attribute is only set on resource creation, so if the secret is manually rotated, terraform will not pick up the change on subsequent runs. In that case, the webhook resource should be tainted and re-created to get the secret back in sync.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 secret 属性设置为仅在创建资源，所以如果秘密手动旋转，terraform不会拿起后续运行的变化。在这种情况下，应该对webhook资源进行污染并重新创建它，以使密码重新同步。

trans-unit.source: Note: The CIDR blocks in the arguments tunnel1_inside_cidr and tunnel2_inside_cidr must have a prefix of /30 and be a part of a specific range. Read more about this in the AWS documentation.
trans-unit.target: 注意：参数 tunnel1_inside_cidr 和 tunnel2_inside_cidr 中的CIDR块必须具有/ 30前缀，并且是特定范围的一部分。在AWS文档中了解有关此内容的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Google Cloud DNS API requires NS records be present at all times. To accommodate this, when creating NS records, the default records Google automatically creates will be silently overwritten. Also, when destroying NS records, Terraform will not actually remove NS records, but will report that it did.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Google Cloud DNS API要求始终存在NS记录。为此，在创建NS记录时，Google自动创建的默认记录将被静默覆盖。此外，销毁NS记录时，Terraform不会实际删除NS记录，但会报告已删除。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Health Check parameters you can set vary by the protocol of the Target Group. Many parameters cannot be set to custom values for network load balancers at this time. See http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/APIReference/API_CreateTargetGroup.html for a complete reference.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以设置的运行状况检查参数因目标组的 protocol 而异。目前，无法为 network 负载平衡器将许多参数设置为自定义值。有关完整参考，请参见http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/APIReference/API_CreateTargetGroup.html。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Health Check parameters you can set vary by the protocol of the Target Group. Many parameters cannot be set to custom values for network load balancers at this time. See http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/APIReference/API_CreateTargetGroup.html for a complete reference.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以设置的运行状况检查参数因目标组的 protocol 而异。目前无法将许多参数设置为 network 负载平衡器的自定义值。有关完整参考，请参见http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/APIReference/API_CreateTargetGroup.html。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Patch Window lasts for 5 hours from the start_hour_utc.
trans-unit.target: 注意：补丁窗口从 start_hour_utc 开始持续 5 个小时。

trans-unit.source: Note: The SoftLayer provider is new as of Terraform 0.6.16. It is ready to be used but many features are still being added. If there is a SoftLayer feature missing, please report it in the GitHub repo.
trans-unit.target: 注意： SoftLayer提供程序是Terraform 0.6.16中新增的。准备使用它，但仍添加了许多功能。如果缺少SoftLayer功能，请在GitHub存储库中报告。

trans-unit.source: Note: The URL must include the path to the Artifactory installation. It will likely end in /artifactory.
trans-unit.target: 注意： URL必须包含Artifactory安装的路径。它可能以 /artifactory 结尾。

trans-unit.source: Note: The content of an object (body field) is available only for objects which have a human-readable Content-Type (text/* and application/json). This is to prevent printing unsafe characters and potentially downloading large amount of data which would be thrown away in favour of metadata.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对象的内容（ body 字段）仅适用于具有人类可读的 Content-Type （ text/* 和 application/json ）的对象。这是为了防止打印不安全的字符以及潜在地下载大量数据，而这些数据将被丢弃而偏向元数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: The credentials hostname must match the hostname in your module sources. If your Terraform Enterprise instance is available at multiple hostnames, use one of them consistently. (The SaaS version of Terraform Enterprise responds to API calls at both its newer hostname, app.terraform.io, and its historical hostname, atlas.hashicorp.com.)
trans-unit.target: 注意：凭证主机名必须与模块源中的主机名匹配。如果您的Terraform Enterprise实例可用于多个主机名，请始终使用其中之一。 （Terraform Enterprise的SaaS版本以其较新的主机名app.terraform.io和其历史主机名atlas.hashicorp.com响应API调用。）

trans-unit.source: Note: The data source is currently following the behavior of the SSM API to return a string value, regardless of parameter type. For type StringList, we can use split() built-in function to get values in a list. Example: split(",", data.aws_ssm_parameter.subnets.value)
trans-unit.target: 注意：无论参数类型如何，数据源当前都遵循SSM API的行为以返回字符串值。对于 StringList 类型，我们可以使用split（）内置函数来获取列表中的值。示例： split(",", data.aws_ssm_parameter.subnets.value)

trans-unit.source: Note: The double-slash, //, is important. It is what tells Terraform that that is the separator for a subdirectory, and not part of the repository itself.

trans-unit.source: Note: The input artifact of an action must exactly match the output artifact declared in a preceding action, but the input artifact does not have to be the next action in strict sequence from the action that provided the output artifact. trans-unit.source: Note: When you change an attribute, such as node_type, by default it is applied in the next maintenance window. Because of this, Terraform may report a difference in its planning phase because the actual modification has not yet taken place. You can use the apply_immediately flag to instruct the service to apply the change immediately. Using apply_immediately can result in a brief downtime as the server reboots. See the AWS Docs on Modifying an ElastiCache Cache Cluster for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：更改属性（例如 node_type )时，默认情况下将在下一个维护窗口中应用该属性。因此，Terraform可能会报告其计划阶段的差异，因为尚未进行实际的修改。您可以使用 apply_immediately 标志来指示服务立即应用更改。在服务器重新启动时，立即使用 apply_immediately 可能会导致短暂的停机时间。有关更多信息，请参阅有关修改ElastiCache缓存集群的AWS文档。

trans-unit.source: Note Terraform primarily deals with remote resources which are able to outlive a single Terraform run, and so local resources can sometimes violate its assumptions. The resources here are best used with care, since depending on local state can make it hard to apply the same Terraform configuration on many different local systems where the local resources may not be universally available. See specific notes in each resource for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意 Terraform主要处理能够胜过一次Terraform运行的远程资源，因此本地资源有时会违反其假设。最好谨慎使用这里的资源，因为依赖于本地状态可能会使得难以在无法普遍使用本地资源的许多不同本地系统上应用相同的Terraform配置。有关更多信息，请参见每个资源中的特定说明。

trans-unit.source: Note When passing in a config file make sure every repo in the auths object has an auth string. If not you'll get an ErrCannotParseDockercfg by the underlying go-dockerclient. On OSX the auth base64 string is stored in the osxkeychain, but reading from there is not yet supported. See go-dockerclient#677 for details.
trans-unit.target: 注意传入配置文件时，请确保 auths 对象中的每个存储库都具有一个 auth 字符串。如果没有，你会得到一个 ErrCannotParseDockercfg 由底层 go-dockerclient 。在OSX上， auth base64字符串存储在 osxkeychain 中，但尚不支持从中读取。有关详细信息，请参见go-dockerclient＃677。

trans-unit.source: Note When working with local files, Terraform will detect the resource as having been deleted each time a configuration is applied on a new machine where the destination dir is not present and will generate a diff to create it. This may cause "noise" in diffs in environments where configurations are routinely applied by many different users or within automation systems.
trans-unit.target: 注意使用本地文件时，每次在不存在目标目录的新计算机上应用配置时，Terraform都会检测到资源已被删除，并将生成差异来创建该资源。在许多不同的用户或自动化系统中常规应用配置的环境中，这可能会导致差异中的“噪音”。

trans-unit.source: Partial state deserves a special mention. Occasionally in Terraform, create or update operations are not atomic; they can fail halfway through. As an example, when creating an AWS security group, creating the group may succeed, but creating all the initial rules may fail. In this case, it is incredibly important that Terraform record the correct partial state so that a subsequent terraform apply fixes this resource.
trans-unit.target: 部分状态值得特别提及。有时在Terraform中，创建或更新操作不是原子操作；他们可能会中途失败。例如，当创建一个AWS安全组时，创建组可能会成功，但是创建所有初始规则可能会失败。在这种情况下，Terraform记录正确的部分状态非常重要，这样后续的 terraform apply 程序才能修复此资源。

trans-unit.source: PreCheck if non-nil, will be called before any test steps are executed. It is commonly used to verify that required values exist for testing, such as environment variables containing test keys that are used to configure the Provider or Resource under test.
trans-unit.target: 在执行任何测试步骤之前，将调用PreCheck（如果非零）。通常用于验证是否存在测试所需的值，例如包含用于配置提供者或被测试资源的测试键的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Primitive types
trans-unit.target: 原始类型

trans-unit.source: Provider Configuration Node - Represents the time to fully configure a provider. This is when the provider configuration block is given to a provider, such as AWS security credentials.
trans-unit.target: 提供商配置节点 -表示完全配置提供商的时间。这是将提供程序配置块提供给提供程序（例如AWS安全凭证）的时间。

trans-unit.source: Providers is a map of terraform.ResourceProvider values with string keys, representing the Providers that will be under test. Only the Providers included in this map will be loaded during the test, so any Provider included in a configuration file for testing must be represented in this map or the test will fail during initialization.
trans-unit.target: Providers是 terraform.ResourceProvider 值与 string 键的映射，表示将要测试的Providers。在测试期间将仅加载此映射中包含的提供程序，因此必须在此映射中表示用于测试的配置文件中包含的任何提供程序，否则在初始化期间测试将失败。

trans-unit.source: README. The root module and any nested modules should have README files. This file should be named README or README.md. The latter will be treated as markdown. There should be a description of the module and what it should be used for. If you want to include an example for how this module can be used in combination with other resources, put it in an examples directory like this. Consider including a visual diagram depicting the infrastructure resources the module may create and their relationship. The README doesn't need to document inputs or outputs of the module because tooling will automatically generate this. If you are linking to a file or embedding an image contained in the repository itself, use a commit-specific absolute URL so the link won't point to the wrong version of a resource in the future.
trans-unit.target: 自述文件。根模块和任何嵌套模块都应具有自述文件。该文件应命名为 README 或 README.md 。后者将被视为减价。应该有关于模块及其用途的描述。如果要提供一个示例说明如何将此模块与其他资源结合使用，请将其放在示例目录中，如下所示。考虑包括描述模块可能创建的基础结构资源及其关系的可视化图。自述文件不需要记录模块的输入或输出，因为工具会自动生成该文件。如果要链接到文件或嵌入存储库本身中包含的图像，请使用特定于提交的绝对URL，以便将来链接不会指向错误的资源版本。

trans-unit.source: Rate Limiting: Clients placing excessive load on the service might be rate-limited and receive a 429 code. This should be interpreted as a sign to slow down, and wait some time before retrying the request.
trans-unit.target: 速率限制：对服务施加过多负载的客户端可能会受到速率限制，并会收到 429 码。应该将其解释为放慢速度的迹象，并等待一段时间才能重试该请求。

trans-unit.source: Redirects: Moved or aliased endpoints redirect with a 301. Endpoints redirecting to the latest version of a module may redirect with 302 or 307 to indicate that they logically point to different resources over time.
trans-unit.target: 重定向：移动或别名的端点使用 301 重定向。重定向到模块的最新版本的端点可以使用 302 或 307 重定向，以指示它们在一段时间内逻辑上指向不同的资源。

trans-unit.source: Remote operations: For larger infrastructures or certain changes, terraform apply can take a long, long time. Some backends support remote operations which enable the operation to execute remotely. You can then turn off your computer and your operation will still complete. Paired with remote state storage and locking above, this also helps in team environments.
trans-unit.target: 远程操作：对于较大的基础架构或某些更改，使用 terraform apply 可能需要很长时间。一些后端支持远程操作，这些操作使该操作可以远程执行。然后，您可以关闭计算机，然后操作仍将完成。配合远程状态存储和上方锁定，这也有助于团队环境。

trans-unit.source: Repository description. The GitHub repository description is used to populate the short description of the module. This should be a simple one sentence description of the module.
trans-unit.target: 存储库描述。GitHub存储库描述用于填充模块的简短描述。这应该是该模块的简单句子描述。

trans-unit.source: Required: Yes
trans-unit.target: 必填：是

trans-unit.source: Resource Meta-Node - Represents a group of resources, but does not represent any action on its own. This is done for convenience on dependencies and making a prettier graph. This node is only present for resources that have a count parameter greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: 资源元节点 -代表一组资源，但不代表其自身的任何操作。这样做是为了方便依赖关系并制作一个漂亮的图。此节点仅对于 count 参数大于1的资源存在。

trans-unit.source: Resource Node - Represents a single resource. If you have the count metaparameter set, then there will be one resource node for each count. The configuration, diff, state, etc. of the resource under change is attached to this node.
trans-unit.target: 资源节点 -表示单个资源。如果设置了 count ，则每个计数将有一个资源节点。更改中的资源的配置，差异，状态等将附加到此节点。

trans-unit.source: Root module That is the current working directory when you run terraform apply or get, holding the Terraform configuration files. It is itself a valid module.
trans-unit.target: 根模块这是您在运行 terraform apply 或 get 时持有Terraform 配置文件的当前工作目录。它本身是一个有效的模块。

trans-unit.source: Root module. This is the only required element for the standard module structure. Terraform files must exist in the root directory of the module. This should be the primary entrypoint for the module and is expected to be opinionated. For the Consul module the root module sets up a complete Consul cluster. A lot of assumptions are made, however, and it is fully expected that advanced users will use specific nested modules to more carefully control what they want.
trans-unit.target: 根模块。这是标准模块结构唯一需要的元素。Terraform文件必须存在于模块的根目录中。这应该是该模块的主要切入点，并且应该被接受。对于Consul模块，根模块会设置完整的Consul群集。但是，有许多假设，并且完全可以预期，高级用户将使用特定的嵌套模块来更仔细地控制他们想要的内容。

trans-unit.source: Service Errors: The usual 5xx errors will be returned for service failures. In all cases it is safe to retry the request after receiving a 5xx response.

trans-unit.source: Slot Policy (powered-on VMs): This allows the definition of a virtual machine "slot", which is a set amount of CPU and memory resources that should represent the size of an average virtual machine in the cluster. To use, set ha_admission_control_policy to slotPolicy.
trans-unit.target: 插槽策略（已启动的VM）：这允许定义虚拟机“插槽”，即一定数量的CPU和内存资源，应代表群集中平均虚拟机的大小。要使用，请将 ha_admission_control_policy 设置为 slotPolicy 。

trans-unit.source: Stack Exchange: Terraform questions often get asked and answered on Server Fault and Stack Overflow. Use the tag "terraform" to help your question be found by Terraform experts, and please be respectful of the "How to Ask" guidelines in each community.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈交换：经常在服务器故障和堆栈溢出方面询问和回答Terraform问题。使用标签“ terraform”可以帮助Terraform专家找到您的问题，并且请尊重每个社区中的“ How to Ask”准则。

trans-unit.source: Standard module structure. The module must adhere to the standard module structure. This allows the registry to inspect your module and generate documentation, track resource usage, parse submodules and examples, and more.
trans-unit.target: 标准模块结构。模块必须遵守标准模块结构。这使注册表可以检查您的模块并生成文档，跟踪资源使用情况，解析子模块和示例等。

trans-unit.source: Success: Return status is 200 on success with a body or 204 if there is no body data to return.
trans-unit.target: 成功：如果成功返回一个正文，则返回状态为 200 ；如果没有正文数据要返回，则返回状态为 204 。

trans-unit.source: TestStep is a single apply sequence of a test, done within the context of a state. Multiple TestSteps can be sequenced in a Test to allow testing potentially complex update logic and usage. Basic tests typically contain one to two steps, to verify the resource can be created and subsequently updated, depending on the properties of the resource. In general, simply create/destroy tests will only need one step.
trans-unit.target: TestStep是在状态的上下文中完成的单个测试应用序列。可以在一个测试中对多个 TestStep 进行排序，以允许测试潜在的复杂更新逻辑和用法。基本测试通常包含一到两个步骤，以验证可以创建资源，然后根据资源的属性对其进行更新。通常，仅创建/销毁测试仅需一步。

trans-unit.source: The customization waiter: This waiter watches events in vSphere to monitor when customization on a virtual machine completes during VM creation. Depending on your vSphere or VM configuration it may be necessary to change the timeout or turn it off. This can be controlled by the timeout setting in the customization settings block.
trans-unit.target: 定制等待程序：此等待程序监视vSphere中的事件，以监视在VM创建期间虚拟机上的定制何时完成。根据您的vSphere或VM配置，可能需要更改超时或将其关闭。这可以通过定制设置块中的 timeout 设置来控制。

trans-unit.source: The following arguments are supported by all connection types:
trans-unit.target: 所有连接类型均支持以下参数：

trans-unit.source: The network waiter: This waiter waits for interfaces to show up on a guest virtual machine close to the end of both VM creation and update. This waiter is necessary to ensure that correct IP information gets reported to the guest virtual machine, mainly to facilitate the availability of a valid, reachable default IP address for any provisioners. The behavior of the waiter can be controlled with the wait_for_guest_net_timeout and wait_for_guest_net_routable settings.
trans-unit.target: 网络服务员：该服务员等待接口显示在VM创建和更新即将结束时的来宾虚拟机上。该服务员对于确保将正确的IP信息报告给来宾虚拟机是必不可少的，主要是为了为任何供应者提供有效，可访问的默认IP地址的可用性。可以使用 wait_for_guest_net_timeout 和 wait_for_guest_net_routable 设置来控制侍者的行为。

trans-unit.source: Thick provisioned eager zeroed:eagerly_scrub should be set to true, and thin_provisioned should be set to false.
trans-unit.target: 厚置备的急切置零： eagerly_scrub 应该设置为true， thin_provisioned 应该设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Thick provisioned lazy zeroed: Both eagerly_scrub and thin_provisioned should be set to false.
trans-unit.target: 厚置备延迟置零：无论 eagerly_scrub 和 thin_provisioned 应设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Thin provisioned:eagerly_scrub should be set to false, and thin_provisioned should be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 精简置备： eagerly_scrub 应该设置为 false ， thin_provisioned 应该设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Use sparingly!depends_on is rarely necessary. In almost every case, Terraform's automatic dependency system is the best-case scenario by having your resources depend only on what they explicitly use. Please think carefully before you use depends_on to determine if Terraform could automatically do this a better way.
trans-unit.target: 谨慎使用！很少需要使用 depends_on 。在几乎每种情况下，Terraform的自动依赖系统都是最理想的情况，因为您的资源仅取决于它们明确使用的资源。在使用 depends_on 以确定Terraform是否可以自动执行此更好的方法之前，请仔细考虑。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: Multiple aws_iam_group_membership resources with the same group name will produce inconsistent behavior!
trans-unit.target: 警告：具有相同组名的多个aws_iam_group_membership资源将产生不一致的行为！

trans-unit.source: WARNING: The aws_iam_policy_attachment resource creates exclusive attachments of IAM policies. Across the entire AWS account, all of the users/roles/groups to which a single policy is attached must be declared by a single aws_iam_policy_attachment resource. This means that even any users/roles/groups that have the attached policy via some mechanism other than Terraform will have that attached policy revoked by Terraform. Consider aws_iam_role_policy_attachment, aws_iam_user_policy_attachment, or aws_iam_group_policy_attachment instead. These resources do not enforce exclusive attachment of an IAM policy.
trans-unit.target: 警告： aws_iam_policy_attachment资源将创建IAM策略的独占附件。在整个AWS账户中，必须通过单个aws_iam_policy_attachment资源声明附加了单个策略的所有用户/角色/组。这意味着，即使通过Terraform以外的某种机制具有附加策略的所有用户/角色/组也将被Terraform撤销该附加策略。请考虑使用 aws_iam_role_policy_attachment ， aws_iam_user_policy_attachment 或 aws_iam_group_policy_attachment 。这些资源不强制执行IAM策略的排他性附件。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: This resource implements a part of the validation workflow. It does not represent a real-world entity in AWS, therefore changing or deleting this resource on its own has no immediate effect.
trans-unit.target: 警告：此资源实现了验证工作流的一部分。它不代表AWS中的实际实体，因此，单独更改或删除此资源不会立即生效。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Attaching volumes requires the servers to be powered off. This will lead to downtime if the server is already in use.
trans-unit.target: 警告：附加卷需要关闭服务器电源。如果服务器已在使用中，则将导致停机。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Due to how Terraform imports resources, the instance_attributes field will only be populated when creating a new instance with terraform. This requires us to ignore any state diffs on changes to the instance_attributes field. Thus, any configuration changes in the instance_attributes field, will not register a diff during a plan or apply. If a user wishes to make a change solely to the supplied instance attributes, and recreate the instance resource, terraform taint is the best solution. You can read more about the taint command here
trans-unit.target: 警告：由于Terraform导入资源的方式，所以只有在使用terraform创建新实例时才会填充 instance_attributes 字段。这要求我们忽略对 instance_attributes 字段所做的更改所引起的任何状态差异。因此， instance_attributes 字段中的任何配置更改都不会在 plan 或 apply 期间注册差异。如果用户希望仅更改所提供的实例属性并重新创建实例资源，则最好使用 terraform taint 。您可以在此处阅读更多有关 taint 命令的信息

trans-unit.source: Warning: Due to limitations of the API, all arguments except labels,cluster_config.worker_config.num_instances and cluster_config.preemptible_worker_config.num_instances are non-updateable. Changing others will cause recreation of the whole cluster!
trans-unit.target: 警告：由于API的限制，除 labels ， cluster_config.worker_config.num_instances 和 cluster_config.preemptible_worker_config.num_instances 之外的所有参数都是不可更新的。改变他人会导致整个集群的重新娱乐！

trans-unit.source: Warning: New organizations have several default policies which will, without extreme caution, be overwritten by use of this resource. The safest alternative is to use multiple google_organization_iam_binding resources. It is easy to use this resource to remove your own access to an organization, which will require a call to Google Support to have fixed, and can take multiple days to resolve. If you do use this resource, the best way to be sure that you are not making dangerous changes is to start by importing your existing policy, and examining the diff very closely.
trans-unit.target: 警告：新组织有几个默认策略，在使用这些资源时会被覆盖，而无需特别注意。最安全的选择是使用多个 google_organization_iam_binding 资源。很容易使用此资源来删除您自己对组织的访问权限，这需要致电Google支持部门进行修复，并且可能需要几天才能解决。如果您确实使用了此资源，那么确保您没有进行危险更改的最佳方法是从导入现有策略开始，并非常仔细地检查差异。

trans-unit.source: Warning After this resource is instantiated, Terraform takes control over all keys with the given path prefix, and will remove any matching keys that are not present in the configuration. It will also delete all keys under the given prefix when a consul_key_prefix resource is destroyed, even if those keys were created outside of Terraform.

trans-unit.source: Warning The --link flag is a legacy feature of Docker. It may eventually be removed. It exposes all environment variables originating from Docker to any linked containers. trans-unit.source: Warning This mechanism is provided as an "escape hatch" for exceptional situations where a first-class Terraform provider is not more appropriate. Its capabilities are limited in comparison to a true data source, and implementing a data source via an external program is likely to hurt the portability of your Terraform configuration by creating dependencies on external programs and libraries that may not be available (or may need to be used differently) on different operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 警告在一流的Terraform提供程序不太合适的特殊情况下，此机制作为“逃生舱口”提供。与真正的数据源相比，其功能受到限制，并且通过在外部程序和库上创建可能不可用（或可能需要使用外部程序）的依赖项，通过外部程序实现数据源可能会损害Terraform配置的可移植性。在不同的操作系统上使用）。

trans-unit.source: Working in a team: Backends can store their state remotely and protect that state with locks to prevent corruption. Some backends such as Terraform Enterprise even automatically store a history of all state revisions.

trans-unit.source: A maintenance window is used to temporarily disable one or more services for a set period of time. No incidents will be triggered and no notifications will be received while a service is disabled by a maintenance window.

trans-unit.source: A Backend Service defines a group of virtual machines that will serve traffic for load balancing. For more information see the official documentation and the API.
trans-unit.target: 后端服务定义了一组虚拟机，它们将为流量提供负载平衡。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: A CDN Endpoint is the entity within a CDN Profile containing configuration information regarding caching behaviors and origins. The CDN Endpoint is exposed using the URL format
trans-unit.target: CDN端点是CDN配置文件中的实体,它包含有关缓存行为和起源的配置信息。CDN端点使用URL格式暴露出来。

trans-unit.source: A Compute Engine Autoscaler automatically adds or removes virtual machines from a managed instance group based on increases or decreases in load. This allows your applications to gracefully handle increases in traffic and reduces cost when the need for resources is lower. You just define the autoscaling policy and the autoscaler performs automatic scaling based on the measured load. For more information, see the official documentation and API
trans-unit.target: Compute Engine自动缩放器会根据负载的增加或减少，自动从托管实例组中添加或删除虚拟机。这样，您的应用程序就可以轻松应对流量的增加，并在资源需求降低时降低成本。您只需定义自动缩放策略，自动缩放器就会根据测得的负载执行自动缩放。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: A Compute Engine Regional Autoscaler automatically adds or removes virtual machines from a managed instance group based on increases or decreases in load. This allows your applications to gracefully handle increases in traffic and reduces cost when the need for resources is lower. You just define the autoscaling policy and the autoscaler performs automatic scaling based on the measured load. For more information, see the official documentation and API
trans-unit.target: Compute Engine区域自动缩放器会根据负载的增加或减少，自动在托管实例组中添加或删除虚拟机。这样，您的应用程序就可以轻松应对流量的增加，并在资源需求降低时降低成本。您只需定义自动缩放策略，自动缩放器就会根据测得的负载执行自动缩放。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: A CryptoKey is an interface to key material which can be used to encrypt and decrypt data. A CryptoKey belongs to a Google Cloud KMS KeyRing.
trans-unit.target: CryptoKey是一个密钥材料的接口,可以用来加密和解密数据。一个CryptoKey属于一个Google Cloud KMS KeyRing。

trans-unit.source: A Dataflow job which is 'destroyed' may be "cancelled" or "drained". If "cancelled", the job terminates - any data written remains where it is, but no new data will be processed. If "drained", no new data will enter the pipeline, but any data currently in the pipeline will finish being processed. The default is "cancelled", but if a user sets on_delete to "drain" in the configuration, you may experience a long wait for your terraform destroy to complete.
trans-unit.target: 被“破坏”的数据流作业可能被“取消”或“耗尽”。如果“取消”，则作业终止-写入的所有数据均保留在原位置，但不会处理任何新数据。如果“排空”，则不会有新数据进入管道，但是管道中当前的所有数据都将完成处理。默认值为“ cancelled”（取消），但是如果用户在配置 on_delete 设置为 "drain" ，则可能需要很长时间才能完成对 terraform destroy 。

trans-unit.source: A Google Cloud Redis instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个谷歌云Redis实例。

trans-unit.source: A KeyRing is a grouping of CryptoKeys for organizational purposes. A KeyRing belongs to a Google Cloud Platform Project and resides in a specific location.
trans-unit.target: KeyRing是一个用于组织目的的CryptoKeys分组。一个KeyRing属于谷歌云平台项目,并驻扎在特定的位置。

trans-unit.source: A Lien represents an encumbrance on the actions that can be performed on a resource.
trans-unit.target: 留置权是对可以在资源上进行的行动的一种限制。

trans-unit.source: A New Version of the Lambda Function
trans-unit.target: Lambda函数的新版本

trans-unit.source: A Record
trans-unit.target: 记录

trans-unit.source: A Region Backend Service defines a regionally-scoped group of virtual machines that will serve traffic for load balancing. For more information see the official documentation and API.
trans-unit.target: 区域后端服务定义了一个区域范围内的虚拟机组，这些虚拟机将为流量提供负载平衡。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: A Replication Controller ensures that a specified number of pod “replicas” are running at any one time. In other words, a Replication Controller makes sure that a pod or homogeneous set of pods are always up and available. If there are too many pods, it will kill some. If there are too few, the Replication Controller will start more.

trans-unit.source: A common architectural pattern is for an organization to use a number of separate AWS accounts to isolate different teams and environments. For example, a "staging" system will often be deployed into a separate AWS account than its corresponding "production" system, to minimize the risk of the staging environment affecting production infrastructure, whether via rate limiting, misconfigured access controls, or other unintended interactions.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见的架构模式是组织使用多个独立的AWS账户来隔离不同的团队和环境。例如,一个 "暂存 "系统通常会部署到一个独立的AWS账户中,而不是其相应的 "生产 "系统,以最大限度地降低暂存环境影响生产基础设施的风险,无论是通过速率限制、错误配置的访问控制,还是其他非预期的互动。

trans-unit.source: A common use for multiple workspaces is to create a parallel, distinct copy of a set of infrastructure in order to test a set of changes before modifying the main production infrastructure. For example, a developer working on a complex set of infrastructure changes might create a new temporary workspace in order to freely experiment with changes without affecting the default workspace.
trans-unit.target: 多个工作空间的一个常见用途是创建一套基础设施的平行、不同的副本,以便在修改主要生产基础设施之前测试一系列变化。例如,正在进行一套复杂的基础设施更改的开发人员可能会创建一个新的临时工作空间,以便在不影响默认工作空间的情况下自由试验更改。

trans-unit.source: A folder can contain projects, other folders, or a combination of both. You can use folders to group projects under an organization in a hierarchy. For example, your organization might contain multiple departments, each with its own set of Cloud Platform resources. Folders allows you to group these resources on a per-department basis. Folders are used to group resources that share common IAM policies.
trans-unit.target: 一个文件夹可以包含项目、其他文件夹或两者的组合。您可以使用文件夹对组织下的项目进行分级分组。例如,您的组织可能包含多个部门,每个部门都有自己的一套云平台资源。文件夹允许您按部门对这些资源进行分组。文件夹用于对共享共同 IAM 策略的资源进行分组。

trans-unit.source: A high degree of control and flexibility is afforded to a vSphere user when it comes to how to configure, deploy, and manage virtual machines - much more control than given in a traditional cloud provider. As such, Terraform has to make some decisions on how to manage the virtual machines it creates and manages. This section documents things you need to know about your virtual machine configuration that you should consider when setting up virtual machines, creating templates to clone from, or migrating from previous versions of this resource.
trans-unit.target: 当涉及到如何配置、部署和管理虚拟机时,vSphere用户可以获得高度的控制权和灵活性--比传统云提供商给予的控制权要大得多。因此,Terraform必须就如何管理其创建和管理的虚拟机做出一些决定。本节记录了您需要了解的关于虚拟机配置的事情,您在设置虚拟机、创建模板以从中克隆或从该资源的以前版本迁移时应该考虑这些事情。

trans-unit.source: A key feature of Terraform is it’s plugin system, separating the logic of managing state and configuration and providing safe plan and apply lifecycle management, from the details of specific vendor APIs. Plugins are responsible for the implementation of functionality for provisioning resources for a specific cloud provider, allowing each Provider to fully support it’s unique resources and lifecycles and not settling for the lowest common denominator across all Provider resources of that type (virtual machines, networks, configuration management systems, et. al). While each Provider is unique, over the years we’ve accumulated some patterns that should be adhered to in order to ensure a consistent user experience when using Terraform for any given provider. Listed below are a few Best Practices we’ve found to generally apply most Providers, with a brief description of each, and link to read more. Each practice is also linked in navigation on the left.
trans-unit.target: Terraform的主要功能是其插件系统，可将管理状态和配置的逻辑与特定供应商API的详细信息分开，提供安全的计划和应用生命周期管理。插件负责实现为特定云提供商配置资源的功能的实现，从而允许每个提供商完全支持其独特的资源和生命周期，而不必为该类型的所有提供商资源（虚拟机，网络，配置）中的最低公分管理系统等）。尽管每个提供程序都是唯一的，但多年来，我们已经积累了一些模式，这些模式必须确保在为任何给定的提供程序使用Terraform时确保一致的用户体验。以下列出了一些我们通常适用于大多数提供商的最佳做法，并附有每一个的简要说明，并链接以了解更多信息。每个练习也都在左侧导航中链接。

trans-unit.source: A provider in Terraform is responsible for the lifecycle of a resource: create, read, update, delete. An example of a provider is AWS, which can manage resources of type aws_instance, aws_eip, aws_elb, etc.
trans-unit.target: Terraform中的提供者负责资源的生命周期：创建，读取，更新，删除。提供程序的一个示例是AWS，它可以管理 aws_instance ， aws_eip ， aws_elb 等类型的资源。

trans-unit.source: A provider is responsible for understanding API interactions and exposing resources. Providers generally are an IaaS (e.g. AWS, GCP, Microsoft Azure, OpenStack), PaaS (e.g. Heroku), or SaaS services (e.g. Terraform Enterprise, DNSimple, CloudFlare).
trans-unit.target: 提供商负责理解API交互和暴露资源。提供商一般是IaaS(如AWS、GCP、Microsoft Azure、OpenStack)、PaaS(如Heroku)或SaaS服务(如Terraform Enterprise、DNSimple、CloudFlare)。

trans-unit.source: A provider's CREATE and UPDATE functions will create or modify resources on the remote API. APIs might perform things like provide default values for unspecified attributes (as described in the above example config/provider code), or normalize inputs (lower or upper casing all characters in a string). The end result is a Backend API containing modified versions of values that Terraform has in its state locally. Immediately after creation or updating of a resource, Terraform will have a stale state, which will result in a detected deviation on subsequent plan or applys, as Terraform refreshes its state and wants to reconcile the diff. Because of this, it is standard practice to call READ at the end of all modifications to synchronize immediately and avoid that diff.
trans-unit.target: 提供者的 CREATE 和 UPDATE 函数将在远程API上创建或修改资源。 API可能会执行类似的操作，例如为未指定的属性提供默认值（如上述示例config / provider代码中所述），或对输入进行规范化（字符串中所有字符的大写或小写）。最终结果是一个后端API，其中包含Terraform在本地状态下具有值的修改版本。在创建或更新资源后，Terraform将立即具有陈旧状态，这将导致在随后的 plan 发现偏差或 apply s，因为Terraform刷新其状态并希望协调差异。因此，通常的做法是调用 READ 在所有修改结束时立即同步并避免差异。

trans-unit.source: A registered domain name is then mapped to a particular "REST API" object using aws_api_gateway_base_path_mapping. The configured domain name then becomes an alias for a particular deployment stage.
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用 aws_api_gateway_base_path_mapping 将注册的域名映射到特定的“ REST API”对象。然后，已配置的域名将成为特定部署阶段的别名。

trans-unit.source: A registry module source is of the form hostname/namespace/name/provider, where the initial hostname portion is implied to be registry.terraform.io/ if not specified. The public Terraform Registry is therefore the default module source.
trans-unit.target: 注册表模块源的格式为 hostname/namespace/name/provider ，如果未指定，则初始主机名部分暗含为 registry.terraform.io/ 。因此，公共Terraform注册表是默认模块源。

trans-unit.source: A resource automatically depends on anything it references via interpolations. The automatically determined dependencies are all that is needed most of the time. You can also use the depends_on parameter to explicitly define a list of additional dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 资源自动依赖于通过插值引用的任何内容。在大多数情况下，自动确定的依赖关系就是所需要的。您还可以使用 depends_on 参数来显式定义其他依赖项列表。

trans-unit.target: 资源配置如下所示。

trans-unit.source: A resource quota provides constraints that limit aggregate resource consumption per namespace. It can limit the quantity of objects that can be created in a namespace by type, as well as the total amount of compute resources that may be consumed by resources in that project.
trans-unit.target: 资源配额提供了限制每个命名空间资源消耗总量的约束条件。它可以按类型限制一个命名空间中可以创建的对象数量,以及该项目中资源可能消耗的计算资源总量。

trans-unit.source: A resource roughly follows the steps below:
trans-unit.target: 资源大致按照以下步骤进行。

trans-unit.source: A resource spec addresses a specific resource in the config. It takes the form:
trans-unit.target: 资源规格是针对配置中的一个特定资源。它的形式是:

trans-unit.source: A route is a rule that specifies how certain packets should be handled by the virtual network. Routes are associated with virtual machines by tag, and the set of routes for a particular virtual machine is called its routing table. For each packet leaving a virtual machine, the system searches that virtual machine's routing table for a single best matching route.
trans-unit.target: 路由是一种规则,它规定了虚拟网络应该如何处理某些数据包。路由通过标签与虚拟机相关联,特定虚拟机的路由集称为其路由表。对于每一个离开虚拟机的数据包,系统都会在该虚拟机的路由表中搜索一条最佳匹配的路由。

trans-unit.source: A service account provides an identity for processes that run in a Pod.
trans-unit.target: 服务账户为Pod中运行的进程提供了一个身份。

trans-unit.source: A simple output configuration looks like the following:
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的输出配置如下。

trans-unit.source: A single virtual CDROM device can be created and attached to the virtual machine. The resource supports attaching a CDROM from a datastore ISO or using a remote client device.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建一个虚拟CDROM设备并将其附加到虚拟机上。该资源支持从数据存储ISO或使用远程客户端设备附加CDROM。

trans-unit.source: A step by step guide for writing, compiling, and executing an example Terraform Provider.
trans-unit.target: 编写、编译和执行Terraform Provider示例的步骤指南。

trans-unit.source: A successful migration usually only results in a configuration-only diff - that is, Terraform reconciles some configuration settings that cannot be set during the migration process with state. In this event, no reconfiguration operations are sent to the vSphere server during the next terraform apply. See the importing section for more details.
trans-unit.target: 成功的迁移通常只会导致仅配置差异-也就是说，Terraform将某些在迁移过程中无法设置的配置设置与状态进行协调。在这种情况下，在下一个 terraform apply 期间不会将任何重新配置​​操作发送到vSphere服务器。有关更多详细信息，请参见导入部分。

trans-unit.source: A successful response has no body, and includes the location from which the module version's source can be downloaded in the X-Terraform-Get header. Note that this string may contain special syntax interpreted by Terraform via go-getter. See the go-getter documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 成功的响应没有正文，并且在 X-Terraform-Get 标头中包含可以从其下载模块版本源的位置。请注意，此字符串可能包含Terraform通过 go-getter 解释的特殊语法。有关详细信息，请参见 go-getter 文档。

trans-unit.source: A team collaborator represents an account that has been given access to a team app on Heroku.
trans-unit.target: 一个团队合作者代表一个账户,该账户已被赋予访问Heroku上的团队应用的权限。

trans-unit.source: A template data source looks like:
trans-unit.target: 一个模板数据源的样子。

trans-unit.source: A user-facing hostname is a fully-specified internationalized domain name expressed in its Unicode form (the corresponding "punycode" form is not allowed) which must be resolvable in DNS to an address that has an HTTPS server running on port 443.
trans-unit.target: 面向用户的主机名是以Unicode形式表示的完整指定的国际化域名（不允许使用相应的“ punycode”形式），该域名必须在DNS中可解析为具有在端口443上运行HTTPS服务器的地址。

trans-unit.source: A valid combination of the above which are required for authentification.
trans-unit.target: 以上认证所需的有效组合。

trans-unit.source: A version number is included in the object path to identify this build. Later we will demonstrate deploying a new version, which will create another separate object.
trans-unit.target: 对象路径中包含了一个版本号来标识这个构建。稍后我们将演示部署一个新版本,这将创建另一个单独的对象。

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine dependency rule applies to vSphere HA, and allows user-defined startup orders for virtual machines in the case of host failure. Virtual machines are supplied via groups, which can be managed via the vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_group resource.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟机相关性规则适用于vSphere HA，并在主机发生故障时允许用户定义虚拟机的启动顺序。虚拟机是通过组提供的，可以通过 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_group 资源进行管理。

trans-unit.source: A virtual server group contains several ECS instances. The virtual server group can help you to define multiple listening dimension, and to meet the personalized requirements of domain name and URL forwarding.
trans-unit.target: 一个虚拟服务器组包含多个ECS实例。虚拟服务器组可以帮助您定义多个监听维度,满足域名和URL转发的个性化需求。

trans-unit.source: API Gateway domains can be defined as either 'edge-optimized' or 'regional'. In an edge-optimized configuration, API Gateway internally creates and manages a CloudFront distribution to route requests on the given hostname. In addition to this resource it's necessary to create a DNS record corresponding to the given domain name which is an alias (either Route53 alias or traditional CNAME) to the Cloudfront domain name exported in the cloudfront_domain_name attribute.
trans-unit.target: API网关域可以定义为“边缘优化”或“区域性”。在边缘优化的配置中，API Gateway在内部创建和管理CloudFront分发以在给定的主机名上路由请求。除了此资源外，还需要创建与给定域名对应的DNS记录，该域名是 cloudfront_domain_name 属性中导出的Cloudfront域名的别名（Route53别名或传统CNAME）。

trans-unit.source: API Gateway's name reflects its original purpose as a public-facing frontend for REST APIs, but it was later extended with features that make it easy to expose an entire web application based on AWS Lambda. These later features will be used in this tutorial. The term "REST API" is thus used loosely here, since API Gateway is serving as a generic HTTP frontend rather than necessarily serving an API.
trans-unit.target: API Gateway的名字反映了它最初的目的是作为REST API的面向公众的前端,但它后来扩展了一些功能,使它能够轻松地暴露基于AWS Lambda的整个Web应用程序。这些后来的功能将在本教程中使用。因此,这里松散地使用了 "REST API "这个术语,因为API Gateway是作为一个通用的HTTP前端,而不一定是服务于API。

trans-unit.source: AWS allows a Direct Connect hosted private virtual interface to be deleted from either the allocator's or accepter's side. However, Terraform only allows the Direct Connect hosted private virtual interface to be deleted from the allocator's side by removing the corresponding aws_dx_hosted_private_virtual_interface resource from your configuration. Removing a aws_dx_hosted_private_virtual_interface_accepter resource from your configuration will remove it from your statefile and management, but will not delete the Direct Connect virtual interface.
trans-unit.target: AWS允许从分配者或接受者一方删除Direct Connect托管的私有虚拟接口。但是，Terraform仅允许通过从配置中删除相应的 aws_dx_hosted_private_virtual_interface 资源从分配器端删除Direct Connect托管的专用虚拟接口。删除 aws_dx_hosted_private_virtual_interface_accepter 从配置资源会从你的状态文件和管理将其删除，但不会删除直连的虚拟接口。

trans-unit.source: AWS allows a Direct Connect hosted public virtual interface to be deleted from either the allocator's or accepter's side. However, Terraform only allows the Direct Connect hosted public virtual interface to be deleted from the allocator's side by removing the corresponding aws_dx_hosted_public_virtual_interface resource from your configuration. Removing a aws_dx_hosted_public_virtual_interface_accepter resource from your configuration will remove it from your statefile and management, but will not delete the Direct Connect virtual interface.
trans-unit.target: AWS允许从分配者或接受者一方删除Direct Connect托管的公共虚拟接口。但是，Terraform仅允许通过从配置中删除相应的 aws_dx_hosted_public_virtual_interface 资源从分配器端删除Direct Connect托管的公共虚拟接口。删除 aws_dx_hosted_public_virtual_interface_accepter 从配置资源会从你的状态文件和管理将其删除，但不会删除直连的虚拟接口。

trans-unit.source: AWS allows a cross-account VPC Peering Connection to be deleted from either the requester's or accepter's side. However, Terraform only allows the VPC Peering Connection to be deleted from the requester's side by removing the corresponding aws_vpc_peering_connection resource from your configuration. Removing a aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter resource from your configuration will remove it from your statefile and management, but will not destroy the VPC Peering Connection.
trans-unit.target: AWS允许从请求者或接受者一方删除跨账户VPC对等连接。但是，Terraform仅允许通过从配置中删除相应的 aws_vpc_peering_connection 资源来从请求方删除VPC对等连接。删除 aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter 从配置资源会从你的状态文件和管理中删除它，但不会破坏VPC对等体连接。

trans-unit.target: 验收测试往往要花钱来进行

trans-unit.source: Acceptance Tests: TestCases
trans-unit.target: 验收测试。测试案例

trans-unit.source: Acceptance Tests: TestSteps
trans-unit.target: 验收测试。测试步骤

trans-unit.source: Acceptance tests are expressed in terms of Test Cases, each using one or more Terraform configurations designed to create a set of resources under test, and then verify the actual infrastructure created. Terraform’s resource package offers a method Test(), accepting two parameters and acting as the entry point to Terraform’s acceptance test framework. The first parameter is the standard *testing.T struct from Golang’s Testing package, and the second is TestCase, a Go struct that developers use to setup the acceptance tests.
trans-unit.target: 验收测试以测试用例表示，每个测试用例都使用一个或多个Terraform配置来设计，以创建一组被测资源，然后验证所创建的实际基础结构。 Terraform的 resource 包提供了一种 Test() 方法，该方法接受两个参数并充当Terraform验收测试框架的入口点。第一个参数是Golang的Testing包中的标准* testing.T结构，第二个参数是TestCase，这是Go结构，开发人员可以使用它来设置验收测试。

trans-unit.source: Acceptance tests can be run using the testacc target in the Terraform Makefile. The individual tests to run can be controlled using a regular expression. Prior to running the tests provider configuration details such as access keys must be made available as environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用Terraform Makefile 中的 testacc 目标运行验收测试。可以使用正则表达式来控制要运行的各个测试。在运行测试提供程序之前，必须将访问密钥之类的配置详细信息用作环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate Types
trans-unit.target: 集合类型

trans-unit.source: Aggregate types are stored in state as a key.index and value pair for each element of the property, with a unique index appended to the key based on the type. There is an additional key.index item included in the state that tracks the number of items the property contains.
trans-unit.target: 聚合类型在状态中存储为属性的每个元素的 key.index 和 value 对，并根据类型将唯一 index 附加到 key 上。状态中还包含一个附加的 key.index 项，用于跟踪属性包含的项数。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate types form more complicated data types by combining primitive types. Aggregate types may define the types of elements they contain by using the Elem property. If the Elem property is omitted, the default element data type is a string.
trans-unit.target: 聚合类型通过组合原始类型来形成更复杂的数据类型。聚合类型可以使用 Elem 属性定义它们包含的元素的类型。如果省略 Elem 属性，则默认元素数据类型为 string 。

trans-unit.source: Almost every Terraform Plugin offers user configurable parameters, examples such as a Provisioner secret_key, a Provider’s region, or a Resources name. Each parameter is defined in the items schema, which is a map of string names to schema structs.
trans-unit.target: 几乎每个Terraform插件都提供用户可配置的参数，例如Provisioner secret_key ，提供者的 region 或资源 name 示例。每个参数都在项目模式中定义，该模式是字符串名称到模式结构的映射。

trans-unit.source: Alongside the mappings between resources and remote objects, Terraform must also track metadata such as resource dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 除了资源和远程对象之间的映射,Terraform还必须跟踪元数据,如资源依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Also, if you have been authenticating with a service principal and you switch to Azure CLI, you must null out the ARM_* environment variables. Failure to do so causes errors to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 另外,如果一直使用服务委托人进行身份验证,并且切换到 Azure CLI,则必须将 ARM_*环境变量清空。如果不这样做,就会抛出错误。

Both GuestInfo and ISO transport methods are supported. For templates that use ISO transport, a CDROM backed by client device is required. See CDROM options for details.

trans-unit.source: Although Terraform can automatically convert between boolean and string values, there are some subtle implications of these conversions that should be completely understood when using boolean values with input variables.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Terraform可以在布尔值和字符串值之间自动转换,但在使用布尔值和输入变量时,应该完全理解这些转换的一些微妙含义。

trans-unit.source: Although in principle it is possible to use any interpolation expression within a provider configuration argument, providers must be configurable to perform almost all operations within Terraform, and so it is not possible to use expressions whose value cannot be known until after configuration is applied, such as the id of a resource.
trans-unit.target: 虽然原则上可以在提供者配置参数中使用任何插值表达式,但提供者必须是可配置的,才能在Terraform中执行几乎所有的操作,因此不可能使用在应用配置后才能知道其值的表达式,例如资源的id。

trans-unit.source: Although the AWS Lambda function used in this guide is very simple, in more practical applications it is possible to use helper libraries to map API Gateway proxy requests to standard HTTP application APIs in various languages, such as Python's WSGI or the NodeJS Express Framework.
trans-unit.target: 尽管本指南中使用的AWS Lambda函数非常简单，但是在更实际的应用程序中，可以使用帮助程序库将API Gateway代理请求映射到各种语言的标准HTTP应用程序API，例如Python的WSGI或NodeJS Express Framework。

trans-unit.source: Although this resource allows a node to be registered, it does not actually configure the computer in question to interact with Chef. In most cases it is better to use the chef provisioner to configure the Chef client on a computer and have it register itself with the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此资源允许注册节点，但实际上并没有配置相关计算机与Chef进行交互。在大多数情况下，最好是使用的 chef 供应者到一台计算机上配置厨师客户端，并将它与厨师服务器注册。

trans-unit.source: Although you cannot modify non-group security rules with this resource, the position_keyword and position_reference parameters allow you to reference some other security rule that already exists, using it as a means to ensure some rough placement within the ruleset as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 尽管您不能使用此资源修改非组安全性规则，但是 position_keyword 和 position_reference 参数允许您引用其他已经存在的安全性规则，以此方式确保整个规则集中的粗略放置。

trans-unit.source: Amazon RDS supports three types of instance classes: Standard, Memory Optimized, and Burstable Performance. For more information please read the AWS RDS documentation about DB Instance Class Types
trans-unit.target: Amazon RDS支持三种类型的实例类：标准，内存优化和突发性能。有关更多信息，请阅读有关数据库实例类类型的AWS RDS文档。

trans-unit.source: An HTTP or HTTPS URL can be used to redirect Terraform to get the module source from one of the other sources. For HTTP URLs, Terraform will make a GET request to the given URL. An additional GET parameter, terraform-get=1, will be appended, allowing you to optionally render the page differently when Terraform is requesting it.
trans-unit.target: HTTP或HTTPS URL可用于重定向Terraform，以从其他来源之一获取模块来源。对于HTTP URL，Terraform将对给定URL 发出 GET 请求。将附加一个附加的 GET 参数 terraform-get=1 ，允许您在Terraform请求页面时有选择地呈现不同的页面。

trans-unit.source: An HTTP(S) load balancer can direct traffic to specified URLs to a backend bucket rather than a backend service. It can send requests for static content to a Cloud Storage bucket and requests for dynamic content a virtual machine instance.

trans-unit.source: An essential component of a distributed, scalable VMware datacenter, the vSphere Distributed Virtual Switch (DVS) provides centralized management and monitoring of the networking configuration of all the hosts that are associated with the switch. In addition to adding port groups (see the vsphere_distributed_port_group resource) that can be used as networks for virtual machines, a DVS can be configured to perform advanced high availability, traffic shaping, network monitoring, and more.
trans-unit.target: vSphere Distributed Virtual Switch（DVS）是分布式可伸缩VMware数据中心的重要组成部分，可对与该交换机关联的所有主机的网络配置进行集中管理和监视。除了添加可用作虚拟机网络的端口组（请参阅 vsphere_distributed_port_group 资源）外，还可将DVS配置为执行高级的高可用性，流量整形，网络监视等。

trans-unit.source: An individual disk sub-resource can be migrated by manually specifying the datastore_id in its sub-resource. This also pins it to the specific datastore that is specified - if at a later time the VM and any unpinned disks migrate to another host, the disk will stay on the specified datastore.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在子资源中手动指定 datastore_id 来迁移单个 disk 子资源。这还会将其固定到指定的特定数据存储-如果稍后VM和任何未固定的磁盘迁移到另一个主机，则该磁盘将保留在指定的数据存储上。

trans-unit.source: An interesting side effect of the underlying XML API - if the device group does not already exist, then this resource can actually create it. However, since only the single entry for the specific serial number is deleted, then a terraform destroy would not remove the device group itself in this situation.
trans-unit.target: 基础XML API的一个有趣的副作用-如果该设备组尚不存在，则该资源实际上可以创建它。但是，由于仅删除了特定序列号的单个条目，因此在这种情况下， terraform destroy 不会删除设备组本身。

trans-unit.source: Another property of Go is that it does not support dynamic libraries. It only supports static binaries. This is part of Go's overall design and is the reason why it produces statically-compiled binaries in the first place -- once you have a Go binary for your platform it should Just Work.
trans-unit.target: Go的另一个特性是它不支持动态库。它仅支持静态二进制文件。这是Go整体设计的一部分，也是它首先生成静态编译二进制文件的原因-一旦为平台准备了Go二进制文件，它就应该可以正常工作。
